creditline: Gift of Loren G. Lipson, M.D.
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red feather fan with multicolored feathers at base of each red feather; beaded handle with image of blue and green hummingbird sitting on a branch under black to medium blue sky with stars at top; tassel with white twisted leather tassels and ovoid silver pendant with three cross-shaped stars and two dangles with faceted beads and beaded bands with stars against sky, and yellow horsehair tassels
medium: Scarlet macaw feather, goose feathers, pheasant feathers, deer leather, beads, silver and other metals, horsehair
title: Morning Hummer fan
